pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, September 2, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Hamilton, Ontario

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Labour Day Parade. Minister of Seniors Filomena Tassi will be in attendance.

Bay Street at Stuart Street

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 9:15 a.m. at the corner of Bay Street and Stuart Street.
